description:
It’s a fact: if you know HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, you already have the tools you need to develop your own native mobile apps for iPhone, Android, and more. In this session, you’ll learn how to use open source web technologies can be used to design and build apps for today’s most popular mobile devices.

Topics covered will include:    • The pros and cons of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript vs native development
   • An overview of jQTouch (an open source jQuery extension)
   • An overview of PhoneGap (an open source development tool for mobile apps)
   • JavaScript API examples for hooking into core device features (accelerometer, camera, location, and more)
title: Building Mobile Apps with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
